entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023
